solution_line_template: During the week she makes {days_per_week} days/week * {cakes_per_day} cakes/day = <<{days_per_week}*{cakes_per_day}={cakes_per_week}>>{cakes_per_week} cakes.
After selling them over the weekend she earns {cakes_per_week} cakes * ${price_per_cake}/cake = $<<{cakes_per_week}*{price_per_cake}={money_per_week}>>{money_per_week}.
